page.title: 16LIFE STYLE
page.content: Congleton does not contain any large fashion SHOPS.The SHOPS in Congleton are mainly very small.Usually by the time any reasonable FASHION clothes have reached Congleton they are not fashionable anymore.I dont shop for clothes in Congelton,I travel to Hanley,which is about half an hour away.Fashion in Congleton is centered on the over 21 age group,or at least the well made clothes are.There are only two shops where I might buy clothes from Congleton.One of which sells Indian and Peruvian CLOTHES and the other selling fashion clothes but both are fairly expensive. In Congleton there are a number of SHOE shops,selling a wide range of shoes to all our tasts.There are three shops selling what might be called fashionable shoes and a couple selling expensive shoes.
